Texts.Chs: 赋予^green;敏捷^reset;和^purple;以太^green;免疫^reset;, 但严重影响^red;能量^reset;供应，且提高^red;饥饿速率^reset;。造成^red;精神错乱^reset;.
Texts.Eng: Grants ^green;agility^reset; and ^purple;Aether ^green;immunity^reset;, but heavily impacts ^red;energy^reset; supply and increases ^red;hunger rate^reset;. Also, ^red;Insanity^reset;.
